Mary Hart, Ward 2
=================

903.559.3187

[Email Mary Hart](mailto:virtuous5451@gmail.com)

November 2017 – November 2027

[Map of Ward 2](https://texarkanatexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/9528/Ward-2-Map-Redistricting-2022)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Blue Ribbon Committee
Precinct Chair 2-C
Deputy Voter Registrar- Bowie County
Texas State Convention Delegate in 2008, 2012, and 2016
Election Judge - 2012 National Election
Election Worker on All Local Levels

Mrs. Hart is married to Oliver Wendell Hart II and has five children: Z’leekia, Aun’tonia’, Kermin, Oliver, and Kenneth. She has 11 grandchildren and 10 great-grandchildren.
